item.title: John Denver - My Sweet Lady
item.description:
Lady
are you crying
Do the tears
belong to me
Did you think
our time together
Was all gone lady
you’ve been dreaming
I’m as close
as I can be
And I swear
to you
Our time has
just begun
Close your eyes
and rest
Your weary mind
I promise
I will stay
right here beside you
Today our lives were
joined became entwined
I wish that
you could know
How much
I love you lady
Are you happy do you
feel the way I do
Are there meanings
that you’ve never
Seen before lady
my sweet lady
I just can’t believe
it’s true
And it’s like
I’ve never ever
Loved before
close your eyes
And rest
your weary mind
I promise I will stay
right here beside you
Today our lives were
joined became entwined
I wish
that you could know
How much I love you
lady are you crying
Do the tears
belongs to me
Did you think
our time together
Was all gone lady
my sweet lady
I’m as close
as I can be
And I swear to you our
time has just begun-

item.title: John Denver - Annie's Song
item.description:
You fill up my senses
like a night
in a forget
Like the mountains
in spring time
like a walk in the rain
Like a storm in the
desert like a sleepy
blue ocean
You fill up my senses
come fill me again
Come let me
love you let me
give my life to you
Let me drown
in your laughter
let me die
in your arms
Let me lay down
beside you
let me always
be with you
Come let me love you
come love me again-

Like a sleepy
blue ocean
You fill up
my senses come
fill me again
Come let me senses
like a night
in a forest
Like the mountains
in spring time
like a walk
in the rain
Like a storm
in the desert
like a sleepy
blue ocean
You fill up my senses
come fill me again-
